function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete data related to epidemic cases","Impact":"Uncertainty in research on COVID-19 dynamic transmissions","Mitigation":"Improve data collection and reporting on epidemic cases","Technologies":"Data analytics, machine learning for data prediction","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Differences in geographical environmental factors","Impact":"Variability in the effectiveness of COVID-19 prevention and control measures","Mitigation":"Tailored strategies based on local geographical factors","Technologies":"Geographical information systems (GIS), spatial analysis tools","People":"Policy makers, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Complex natural and social factors influencing epidemic prevention","Impact":"Difficulty in simulating the effectiveness of interventions","Mitigation":"Integration of spatial and temporal information in modeling","Technologies":"Simulation modeling, data integration tools","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
